alert.note: Alert for Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central St. John The Baptist, Ascension, St. James, southwestern St. Helena, Livingston, east central Iberville, East Baton Rouge and northeastern Assumption Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Gonzales, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Oak Hills Place, Reserve, St. Gabriel, Walker, Gramercy, Lutcher, Livingston, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Westminster, Geismar, Watson and Garyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 158 and 199. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 28. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 3 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension
